We accept the love we think we deserve.
We are alive when we’re in love.
We loved with a love that was more than love.
I am happiest when I’m right next to you.
I am in love with you and all of the little things that make you, you.
We were together even when we were apart.
I belong to you and you belong to me also the best couple we always will be.
Today we hold a pen of our common happiness, so let’s start writing our own love story!
You may hold my hand for a while, but you hold my heart forever.
In order to be happy oneself it is necessary to make at least one other person happy.
To love is nothing. To be loved is something. But to love and be loved, that’s everything.
The first time you touched me, I knew I was born to be yours.
With you, I am. Without you, I am not.
I have crossed oceans of time to find you.
It’s enough for me to be sure that you and I exist at this moment.
We should meet in another life, we should meet in air, me and you.
Don’t ever think I fell for you or fell over you. I didn’t fall in love; I rose in it.
For the two of us, home isn’t a place. It is a person. And we are finally home.
You are pretty much the only thing that makes me want to get up in the morning.
I would rather share one lifetime with you, than face all the ages of this world alone.
Remember, we’re madly in love, so it’s alright to kiss me anytime you feel like it.
A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is a reality.
Let us remember to always rediscover one another because we are forever changing.
If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day, so I never have to live without you.
Three things I want in a relationship: Eye’s that won’t cry, lips that won’t lie, and love that won’t die.
World’s most annoying couple.
Are we not like two volumes of one book?
Love is being stupid together.
Haters gonna hate, but you taste great!
You are the very best of me.
I wasn’t kissing her, I was whispering in her mouth!
We go together like frosting and cupcakes.
I’m like the dead sea – you’ll never sink when you are with me.
I want all of you forever, you and me, every day.
You and I are cupcakes for an everlasting honeymoon party.
She loved him and he loved her but it wasn’t that simple.
I know there are millions of fish in the sea, but you’re my Nemo.
I want to tie your shoes because I’d hate for you to fall for someone else.
My wife gets all the money I make. I just get an apple and clean clothes every morning.
When the universe is pushing us towards the right, why must we insist on going left?
You will forever be mine always.
I carry your heart I carry it in my heart.
That warm and fuzzy feeling called love? I found it… Here’s what it looks like.
With the power of love; our two hearts can enlighten the whole world.
All love stories are beautiful, but ours is my favorite.
I want all of you, forever, you and me, every day.
The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
Happiness isn’t what you find at the end of the road. It’s right here. Right now.
It was no fun being crazy alone, so we decided to be crazy together.
Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
I smile because it is a wonderful day for a wonderful person – you. You make me happy.
Let us Flip the coin the see. Head, I am yours. Tail, you are mine. So, we won’t lose.
Without his love I can do nothing, with his love, there is nothing I cannot do.
I and you are built of armor. Nothing can stop love from loving us.
I’d rather die tomorrow than live a hundred years without knowing you.
You are my song. You are my song of love.
Love is a game that two can play and both win.
Because being the sane and sophisticated couple is too mainstream!
THIS is the moment we knew, we are in this forever!
Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
I thank this world because it gave you to me, only you make me smile and make me happy.
Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone — we find it with another.
I have loved you all my life; it has just taken me this long to find you.
He felt now that he was not simply close to her, but that he did not know where he ended and she began.
If you find someone you love in your life, then hang on to that love.
The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
